text: Muntaka Connmassie, CON (10 February 1946 - 12 October 2017) was a Nigerian judge. He was born in Kaduna State, Nigeria. He served as a Justice of the Supreme Court of Nigeria from 2008 through 2016. Before to joining the Supreme Court of Nigeria in 2008, he was a Judge at the Court of Appeal, serving in Port Harcourt, Jos, Abuja, Ilorin, and Benin divisions. Connmassie died on 12 October 2017 in Abuja, Nigeria at the age of 71.Ex-Supreme Court Judge, Coommassie dies at 71 ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Judges Category:Nigerian lawyers Category:People from Kaduna State
title: Muntaka Connmassie
